features.name: Authentication
features.description:
In order to ensure that only authorized users can view administrative content
As a user
I want to be able to sign in to the site

elements.name: Non-logged in users should be redirected to a log in page

steps.name: there is one administrative user
I go to the admin dashboard page
I should see "Para continuar, faça login ou registre-se."

arguments.val: Para continuar, faça login ou registre-se.

elements.name: Users should be able to sign in

steps.name: there is one administrative user
I go to the admin dashboard page
I fill in the admin login form
I press "Login"
I should see "Conectado com sucesso."

elements.name: Deactivated user trying to log in

steps.name: there is one deactivated user
I go to the admin dashboard page
I fill in the admin login form
I press "Login"
I should not see "Signed in successfully."

elements.name: Logging out

steps.name: I am logged in to the admin section
I follow "Sair"
I should see "Para continuar, faça login ou registre-se."

arguments.val: Para continuar, faça login ou registre-se.

features.name: Copy the petition link to clipboard
features.description:
In order to share the petition link to my friends
As an user
I want to copy the link to my clipboard

elements.name: Petition's display copy link is enabled

steps.name: there is a petition with display copy link enabled
I am logged in via Facebook
I am on the first petition page
I fill in "petition_signature_comment" with "Save your city!"
I press "Assine"
I should not see "clippy"

elements.name: Petition's display copy link is disabled

steps.name: there is a petition with display copy link disabled
I am logged in via Facebook
I am on the first petition page
I fill in "petition_signature_comment" with "Save your city!"
I press "Assine"
I should not see "clippy"

features.name: Flag inappropriate debate comments
features.description:
In order to maintain the quality of the debate comments
As an guest
I want to flag inappropriate debate comments

elements.name: The one where the user flag a comment as inapropriate

steps.name: I am logged in via Facebook
There is a commented debate
I am on this debate page
I follow "Denunciar"
I should see "Desfazer denúncia"

elements.name: The one where the user unflag a comment

steps.name: I am logged in via Facebook
There is a commented debate
I am on this debate page
I follow "Denunciar"
I follow "Desfazer denúncia"
I should see "Denunciar"

features.name: Managing Users
features.description:
In order to control who can access and administrate content on the site
As a superuse
I want to be able to manage users

elements.name: Users index

steps.name: I am logged in to the admin section
I follow "Users"
I should see a list of administrative users

elements.name: Add a new user account

steps.name: I am logged in to the admin section
I follow "Users"
I follow "Novo(a) Admin User"
I should see a new User form

elements.name: New Admin User account

steps.name: I am logged in to the admin section
I follow "Users"
I follow "Novo(a) Admin User"
I fill out the new User form
I press "Create Admin user"
I should see "Admin user was successfully created."
I should see "Nicolas"
I should see user avatar
I should not see "This user's account has been deactivated"

arguments.val: This user's account has been deactivated

steps.name: I should not see "This user has all administrative privileges"

arguments.val: This user has all administrative privileges

elements.name: Create a new admin user account

steps.name: I am logged in to the admin section
I follow "Users"
follow "Novo(a) Admin User"
I fill out the new User form
I check "Admin"
I press "Create Admin user"
I should see "Admin user was successfully created"

elements.name: New Admin User account with not all fields filled in

steps.name: I am logged in to the admin section
I follow "Users"
I follow "Novo(a) Admin User"
I fill in "First name" with "Dumbo"
I press "Create Admin user"
I should not see "New user created."

elements.name: New Admin User without filling in the password

steps.name: I am logged in to the admin section
I follow "Users"
I follow "Novo(a) Admin User"
I fill in "First name" with "Dumbo"
I fill in "Last name" with "the Elephant"
I fill in "Email" with "dumbo253@gmail.com"
I press "Create Admin user"
I should not see "New user created."
I should see "não pode ficar em branco"

elements.name: Edit a user's account details

steps.name: I am logged in to the admin section
I follow "Users"
I follow "Edit"
I should see an edit User form

elements.name: Editing a user's account details with updated password

steps.name: I am logged in to the admin section
there are 2 admin users
I follow "Users"
I follow "Edit"
I fill in the edit user form
I press "Update Admin user"
I should see "Admin user was successfully updated."

elements.name: Editing a user's account details without updating password

steps.name: I am logged in to the admin section
there are 2 admin users
I follow "Users"
I follow "Edit"
I fill in the edit user form without the password field
I press "Update Admin user"
I should see "Admin user was successfully updated."

elements.name: Editing a user's account details (incorrectly filled-out fields)

steps.name: I am logged in to the admin section
there are 2 admin users
I follow "Users"
I follow "Edit"
I fill in "Email" with "Not An Email Address"
I press "Update Admin user"
I should not see "Admin user was successfully updated."

comments.value: # Scenario: Editing logged-in user's account details
#   Given I am logged in to the admin section
#   And I follow "Edit registration"
#   When I fill in the edit user form
#   And I press "Update"
#   Then I should see "You updated your account successfully."

elements.name: Deactivating an user

steps.name: I am logged in to the admin section
there is one activated user
I am on the admin users page
I follow the first activated user
I uncheck "Active"
I press "Update Admin user"
I should see "Admin user was successfully updated."
I should see "This user's account has been deactivated"

arguments.val: This user's account has been deactivated

elements.name: Remove an user account

steps.name: I am logged in to the admin section
there are 2 admin users
I am on the admin users page
I follow "Delete"
I should see "Admin user was successfully destroyed."

features.name: Managing Debates
features.description:
In order to better expose a debate
As a admin
I want to be able to create and manage a debate page

elements.name: Debates index

steps.name: I am logged in to the admin section
1 debates exist
I follow "Debates"
I should see the debate index page

elements.name: Creating a debate

steps.name: I am logged in to the admin section
3 members exist
1 issues exist
I follow "Debates"
I click "Novo(a) Debate"
I fill in the debate form with correct information
I press "Create Debate"
I should see "Debate was successfully created."

elements.name: Creating a debate with unknown authors

steps.name: I am logged in to the admin section
3 members exist
I follow "Debates"
I click "Novo(a) Debate"
I fill in the debate form with incorrect information
I press "Create Debate"
I should not see "Debate was successfully created."

features.name: Managing Autofire Emails
features.description:
In order to collect thank petition signatories
As a admin
I want to be able to create and manage autofire emails

comments.value: # Leaving test, but for now we're not displaying
# the email index... I have a feeling it is not
# the last we've seen of it thought
# Scenario: Email index
#   Given I am logged in to the admin section
#   And 2 autofire emails exist
#   When I follow "Emails"
#   Then I should see a list of emails

elements.name: New Email form

steps.name: I am logged in to the admin section
I am on the admin autofire emails page
I follow "Novo(a) Autofire Email"
I should see a new autofire email form

elements.name: New Email creation

steps.name: I am logged in to the admin section
1 petitions exist
I am on the new admin autofire email page

arguments.val: the new admin autofire email page

steps.name: I select the first Petition
I fill in "Subject" with "Cucumber Title"
I fill in "Message" with "Obrigado"
I press "Create Autofire email"
I should see "Cucumber Title"

features.name: Managing Issues
features.description:
In order to organize content
As a admin
I want to be able to create and manage issues

elements.name: Issue index

steps.name: I am logged in to the admin section
2 issues exist
I follow "Issues"
I should see a list of issues

elements.name: New Issue form

steps.name: I am logged in to the admin section
I am on the admin issues page
I follow "Novo(a) Issue"
I should see new issue form

features.name: Manage my profile information
features.description:
In order to keep my profile updated
As a member
I want to manage my profile information

features.name: Managing Personal Stories
features.description:
In order to better expose a personal story
As a admin
I want to be able to create and manage personal stories

elements.name: Personal Stories index

steps.name: I am logged in to the admin section
1 personal stories exist
I follow "Personal Stories"
I should see the personal story index page

elements.name: Creating a Personal Story

steps.name: I am logged in to the admin section
3 personal stories exist
I follow "Personal Stories"
I click "Novo(a) Personal Story"
I fill in the personal story form with correct information
I press "Create Personal story"
I should see "Personal story was successfully created."

features.name: Managing Petitions
features.description:
In order to collect signatures
As a admin
I want to be able to create and manage petitions

elements.name: Petition index

steps.name: I am logged in to the admin section
2 petitions exist
I follow "Petitions"
I should see a list of petitions

elements.name: New Petition form

steps.name: I am logged in to the admin section
I am on the admin petitions page
I follow "Novo(a) Petition"
I should see new petition form

elements.name: Previewing a petition

steps.name: I am logged in to the admin section
1 petitions exist
I am on the admin petitions page
I follow "Preview"
I should see a petition preview page

elements.name: Trying to view a preview of a published petition

steps.name: I am logged in to the admin section
1 published petitions exist
I am on the admin petitions page
I should not see "Preview"

elements.name: Exporting a list of people who have a petition

steps.name: I am logged in to the admin section
1 published petitions exist
I am on the admin petitions page
I click "Export Signatures"
I should see "The list of signatures for the petition has been exported to Amazon Web Services."

arguments.val: The list of signatures for the petition has been exported to Amazon Web Services.

features.name: Managing Tell a Friend pages
features.description:
In order to encourage signatories to share petitions 
As an admin
I want to be able to create and manage tell a friend pages

elements.name: TAF index

steps.name: I am logged in to the admin section
2 Tell a Friend pages exist
I am on the admin tafs page
I should see a list of tafs

elements.name: New TAF form

steps.name: I am logged in to the admin section
I am on the admin tafs page
I follow "Novo(a) Taf"
I should see a new taf form

elements.name: New Taf creation

steps.name: I am logged in to the admin section
1 petitions exist
I am on the new admin taf page
I fill out the taf form
I press "Create Taf"
I should see "Taf was successfully created."

features.name: 3rd party sign-in
features.description:
In order to avoid creating an account on the Meu Rio site
as a guest
I should be able to login via 3rd party sites

elements.name: Login Button

steps.name: I am not logged in
homepage content exists
go to the home page
I should see "Entrar"

elements.name: Logout Button

steps.name: I am logged in via Facebook
homepage content exists
go to the home page
I should see "Sair"

features.name: Moderate a comment
features.description:
In order to filter inadequate comments 
As an admin
I want to moderate a comment

elements.name: Comments index

steps.name: I am logged in to the admin section
2 comments are in the moderation queue
I follow "Comments"
I should see a list of comments

comments.value: #  Scenario: Comments index should not show comments out of moderation
#  Given I am logged in to the admin section
#  And 1 comment is in the moderation queue
#  And 1 comment is not in the moderation queue
#  When I follow "Comments"
#  Then I should see only the first comment

elements.name: Comments should have moderated scope to show moderated comments

steps.name: I am logged in to the admin section
1 comment is in the moderation queue
1 comment is moderated
I follow "Comments"
I follow "Moderated"
I should see only the moderated comment

elements.name: See comment accepted

steps.name: I am logged in to the admin section
1 comment is in the moderation queue
the first debate comment is accepted
I follow "Comments"
I follow "Moderated"
I should see the first comment having "Comment Accepted" as "Yes"

elements.name: See comment rejected

steps.name: I am logged in to the admin section
1 comment is in the moderation queue
the first debate comment is rejected
I follow "Comments"
I follow "Moderated"
I should see the first comment having "Comment Accepted" as "No"

elements.name: Accept comment

steps.name: I am logged in to the admin section
1 comment is in the moderation queue
I follow "Comments"
I click "Yes"
the first debate comment should be accepted

elements.name: Reject comment

steps.name: I am logged in to the admin section
1 comment is in the moderation queue
I follow "Comments"
I click "No"
the first debate comment should be rejected

features.name: In order to get to know every piece of content ever created for an issue
features.description:
As a guest 
       I want to view issue's archive

elements.name: Viewing an issue archive page

steps.name: 1 complete issues exist
I go to an issue archive page
I should see "Arquivo"
I should see the issue's first debate's title
I should see the issue's first personal story's title
I should see the issue's first petition's headline

elements.name: Viewing an issue archive page for an issue without any associated content

steps.name: 1 issues exist
I go to an issue archive page
I should see "Arquivo"
I should see "Exibindo 0-0 de 0"

elements.name: Seeing another issue's archive

steps.name: 2 complete issues exist
I go to an issue archive page
I press the issue's name
I click the other issue's name
I should see the other issue's title
I should see the other issue's first debate's title
I should not see the original issue's first debate's title

features.name: In order to get an overview about an issue
features.description:
as a guest
       I should be able to view an issue page

elements.name: Viewing an issue page

steps.name: 1 complete issues exist
I go to an issue page
I should see the issue name

features.name: View the personal story videos for an issue
features.description:
In order to learn how issues effect individuals
As a guest
I should be able to view the personal story videos for an issue

elements.name: Viewing the personal stories issue index page

there are 3 personal stories connected to the issue
I go to the personal stories page for an issue

arguments.val: the personal stories page for an issue

steps.name: I should see a video
I should see the first video's title
I should see the first video's description
I should see the other stories' thumbnails

steps.name: 1 issues exist
there are 3 personal stories connected to the issue
I go to the personal stories page for an issue

arguments.val: the personal stories page for an issue

steps.name: I click on a thumbnail for a video
I should see the selected video's title
I should see the selected video's description

elements.name: Back button should work on personal stories issue index page

steps.name: 1 issues exist
there are 3 personal stories connected to the issue
I go to the personal stories page for an issue

arguments.val: the personal stories page for an issue

steps.name: I click on a thumbnail for a video
I press the back button
I should see the first video's description

elements.name: Back button should work if you watch more than one video

steps.name: 1 issues exist
there are 3 personal stories connected to the issue
I go to the personal stories page for an issue

arguments.val: the personal stories page for an issue

I click on another thumbnail for a video
I press the back button

there are 3 personal stories connected to the issue

steps.name: I should see that video's title
I should see that video's description
I should see the other stories' thumbnails
